text: A Day at the Roses is a 1937 American comedy movie directed by Sam Wood and stars The Marx Brothers, Allan Jones, Maureen O'Sullivan, Margaret Dumont. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1938. ==Other websites== * * Category:1937 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Sam Wood
title: A Day at the Races (movie)
